class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Lord! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">Bound </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Love! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: There came a day at summer's full
